data.product_name: Related Marketing Cloud (RMC) Customer Journey Manager

initial_reviews.review_title: As global localization manger responsible for operations including  marketing and Sales
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Related Marketing Cloud (RMC) Customer Journey Manager?
Global customers reach, real-time data sharing with respect to product and service, increase in sales revenue customer wise, region wise, product and services wise

What do you dislike about Related Marketing Cloud (RMC) Customer Journey Manager?
the cost associated with cloud operations and data accuracy, outdated technology solutions, needs constant innovation or up-gradation to meet the market and customers' challenges

What problems is Related Marketing Cloud (RMC) Customer Journey Manager solving and how is that benefiting you?
real-time data sharing with customers, data management and demographic characteristics of potential buyers analysis, increase in sales revenue, more product and services sales
